name: Howard GIBSON, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS: Thomas Rowlands, Senior Records Supervisor, Sci-Graterford, Appellees
name_abbreviation: Gibson v. Pennsylvania Department of Corrections

parties: Howard GIBSON, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS: Thomas Rowlands, Senior Records Supervisor, Sci-Graterford, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 28th day of March, 2013, the above captioned appeal is quashed for failure to file a brief.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
66 A.3d 760
Howard GIBSON, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS: Thomas Rowlands, Senior Records Supervisor, Sci-Graterford, Appellees.
No. 28 EAP 2012.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
March 28, 2013.
